description:
This course is intended to teach the student how to assemble a basic survival kit that is easily carried. It will show the student how to use the equipment to quickly and effectively increase their chances of survival in an emergency.

This course is intended to people with limited experience in Survival skills however it will also enhance the skill sets of those who currently practice bushcraft, prepping or woodsman skills. It is perfect for those who enjoy the great outdoors whether they are hunting, fishing or hiking on the trails etc.

This course contains an extensive overview of the Basic kit requirements  and skills sets used in wilderness survival through video as we feel that this is more effective as a learning tool. 

The course itself is comprised of four content laden lectures totalling over 1 hour of teaching. Although whilst learning and practising, honing and owning the skill sets contained within the course will take each individual a different amount of time. With that being said former students have successfully got the basics down within a couple of hours of practice.

Why should you take this course? To answer this simply you owe it to yourself, your family and loved ones to do everything in your power to enhance your chances of SURVIVAL in an emergency. How much is your life worth??
title: Survival 101 - What you need to know for when the SHTF !
